comment.author: 61804295@N00
comment._content: Can you please show on the map the quarry location, we all know where the pylon is! This shot doesn't seem to have an exact map location! www.flickr.com/photos/statelibraryofnsw/7218563086/in/pho... Unless it WAS in the middle of town!

comment.realname: State Library of New South Wales
comment.author: 29454428@N08
comment._content: This photograph is the southern approaches to the Harbour Bridge. One of the other correspondents has added a link to exactly where the quarry was in Moruya on one of the other photographs in this small set.
